questions.quote: Thank you. If we were in my apartment and we were watching a movie on the couch, would we sit right next to each other?
Well, Kramer thought it would make her happy.  I never should have cashed those checks!
Oh, thank you, thank you so much. I have so many people I want to thank and don't want to forget anyone...
I don't want to hear another word. And to think how close I came to you being the one! I must have been out of my mind.
Let's turn the radio on. Maybe there's a news report about it.
It's amazing how many beautiful women live in New York. I actually find it kind of intimidating.
The better looking they are, the faster they go! I mean, I see they out there on the street, they're zooming around, like a blur. Like they have a motor on their ass.
Yeah, I've considered that.  Look, how do I get in touch with this guy?
All right, so you're chewing your apple, you got your enthusiastic hi... Go ahead.
Yeah, doctor. I'm going to have to wait in that little room all by myself, aren't I?  I better take this. I hate the little room.  "Oh, hello, Doctor."
